entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students returning to Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being present in the scene.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the students returning to Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being present in the scene and comforting his mother.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is one of the students returning to Hogwarts. She is mentioned as being present in the scene and comforting her mother.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is Harry's mother and is present in the scene, saying goodbye to her children.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is Harry's father and is mentioned as being at work.

entities.name: fleur

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is one of the Weasley children and is mentioned as having stormed out of the house on Christmas Day.

relationships.description: Ginny comforts her mother, Mrs Weasley, who is crying.
Ron also comforts his mother, Mrs Weasley, who is crying.
